GPIONUM_DOC: Enter the GPIO number on which the button is wired (choose one with interrupt support)
NBSONGS_DOC: Enter the number of random songs to add to queue
NBSONGS_LBL: Number of Songs for random action
DEBOUNCE_DOC: minimum number of miliseconds needed between two events (5 should be fine on all RPI, but you should try others value depending on your board)
ACTIVELOW_DOC: Set to true if a click change GPIO state from 1 to 0. Set to false if a click change GPIO state from 0 to 1 (RPI with IRQ backed GPIO should set it to true)
EDGE_DOC: Set which state should generate a click. (Falling is ok on RPI with IRQ backed GPIO. some other boards need to set it to 'both'
ERROR_NOT_A_NUMBER_MESSAGE: All fields must be filled with a number greater than 0
ERROR_EMPTY_URI_MESSAGE: An action of type play an URI implies to enter an URI
CLICKTIMEOUT_DOC: Enter the number of miliseconds to detect single / double / triple click. Recommended value is between 500 and 900
SINGLECLICK_DOC: Check to enable single click action
SINGLECLICKACTION_DOC: Select an action to trigger upon single click
DOUBLECLICK_DOC: Check to enable double click action
DOUBLECLICKACTION_DOC: Select an action to trigger upon double click
TRIPLECLICK_DOC: Check to enable triple click action
TRIPLECLICKACTION_DOC: Select an action to trigger upon tripple click
URI_DOC: Enter an URI of the audio stream to play
RADIO_DOC: Select a radio from your favorite webradio list. Beware, this list is loaded uppon plugin start. You need to disabled and re-enabled the plugin in order to reloads radios.
